page.title: 10A Day With Colette Holden
page.content: Colette Holden is a pupil at Rothersthorpe C.E. Primary School. She gets up at 8am and arrives at school at 8.45am. School starts at 9 o'clock. Colette works until 10.30 when the school has morning break. Break finishes at 11am, so Colette works from then until 12 noon. School restarts at 1.45pm, and breaks again at 2.30pm. End of break is 2.45pm and school finishes at 3.45pm. In the evening when the nights are ligher Colette plays out until 7.30pm. She reads until bedtime and goes to bed at 8.30pm.
